/1a 0 00000000 00000000000000000000000
or  1 00000000 00000000000000000000000

b)  1 10001011 00001011011000000000000

c)  1 10001110 01001001010110001000000

/2 	0/1 sign
	only zero in biased exponent. real exp is -127
	every digit is shown in the mantissa. no hidden 1
	used in numbers smaller than 2^-126
	
/3a 1234 = 	 0 10001001 00110100100000000000000
	0.0001 = 0 01110001 10100100000000000000000
	
b)	
   
c)  

/4a 0 01111011 00000000000000000000000 = 1 *2^123
	0 10000000 00000000000000000000000 = 1 *2^128
	
	1 *2^123 = 0.00001 *2^128
	
	1 + 0.00001 = 1.00001
	
	result 0 10000000 00001000000000000000000

b) 	0 01111011 00000000000000000000000
   *0 10000000 00000000000000000000000
   
   exponent: 2^123 + 2^128 - 2^127 = 2^124
   mantissa = 1*1 = 1

	result 0 01111100 00000000000000000000000
	
/5a	3 = 0011
	4 = 0100
 1690 = 11010011010

	3 = 3 *10^0
	3 = 000.3 *10^3
  
  1690 = 1.690 *10^3
  
	1.690 *10^3
   +0.003 *10^3
   =1.693 (3 digits max) -> 169
   
	1.690 *10^3
   +0.004 *10^3
   =1.694 (3 digits max) -> 169
   
b)	3 = 3 *10^0
	4 = 4 *10^0
	
	3.000 *10^0
   +4.000 *10^0
   =7.000 (3 digits max) -> 007 = 7
   
   7 = 0.7 * 10^1
   
   1.690 *10^3
  +0.007 *10^3
  =1.697 (3 digits max) -> 170
